Package moa.evaluation

Class BasicMultiLabelPerformanceEvaluator

java.lang.Object
moa.AbstractMOAObject
moa.evaluation.BasicMultiLabelPerformanceEvaluator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, LearningPerformanceEvaluator<Example<Instance>>, MultiTargetPerformanceEvaluator, MOAObject
public class BasicMultiLabelPerformanceEvaluator
extends AbstractMOAObject
implements MultiTargetPerformanceEvaluator
Multilabel Window Classification Performance Evaluator.
Version:
$Revision: 1 $ Added instance based F-Measure, Recall, Precision and Accuracy, $Revision: 2 $
Author:
Jesse Read (jesse@tsc.uc3m.es), R. Sousa, J.Gama
